name: Naked in the Desert - An adventure sandbox game
name_original: Naked in the Desert - An adventure sandbox game
description:
THE JOURNEY OF A THOUSAND MILES ENDS AT THE EDGE...EXPLORE, WALK, RUN, or DIE! **WARNING: NOT SUITABLE FOR YOUNGER AUDIENCES.

**MATURE: SUITABLE FOR 17 AND UP. Game features NUDITY and STRONG LANGUAGE.

Lenny is a sex-addict. He loves to have sex with everyone's mother. Part of his recovery is to survive in the desert, naked.

Tammi is an awful person. She ate all the doughnuts in the break room and has used every pen in the office supply room. She needs alone-time in the desert, also naked.

Both Lenny and Tammi have the use of their cell phone light to guide them through the night.

Naked in the Desert © 2016. All Rights Reserved. Game created by Exploitation Games.

KEY FEATURES
  • Explore the desert naked: walk or run
  • An adventure, sandbox game with a huge map to explore
  • Find various objects and see what they do
  • PLAY Lenny "Male View" or
  • PLAY Tammi "Female View" or
  • PLAY both
  • Beautiful night setting with a full moon and falling stars
  • What's at the edge?
  • 3D game
**WARNING: NOT SUITABLE FOR YOUNGER AUDIENCES.

**MATURE: SUITABLE FOR 17 AND UP. Game features NUDITY and STRONG LANGUAGE.

GAME #4

This is our 4th game. The map of the game is very large and includes various objects, all made by us, using LightWave3D. Game made with Unity3D.
